alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Chatham; Liberty; McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 20 at 5:01PM EDT until October 20 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...LIBERTY...MCINTOSH AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 501 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Catherines Island, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Jones, Midway, Riceboro, Belfast, Halfmoon Landing, Harris Neck, St. Catherines Island, Retreat, Keller, South Newport, Sunbury, and Shellman Bluff. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 65 and 78. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
